Inspirado en las aventuras y la imaginación que adoramos de la ciencia ficción clásica, No Man's Sky te presenta toda una galaxia para que la explores, llena de singulares planetas y formas de vida, junto a peligro y acción constantes.
 
 En No Man's Sky, cada estrella es la luz de un sol lejano que orbitan planetas repletos de vida, y puedes ir a todos los que quieras. Vuela suavemente desde las profundidades espaciales hasta la superficie de los planetas, sin pantallas de carga y sin límites. En este universo infinito generado de forma procedimental, descubrirás lugares y criaturas que ningún otro jugador ha visto antes y, quizá, nunca más nadie vuelva a ver. Emprende un viaje épico En el centro de la galaxia yace un pulso irresistible que te incita a viajar hacia él para aprender la verdadera naturaleza del cosmos. Pero, al enfrentarte a criaturas hostiles y feroces piratas, descubrirás que la muerte tiene un precio y que tu supervivencia dependerá de las decisiones que tomes al mejorar tu nave, tu arma y tu traje. Busca tu propio destino Tu viaje a través de No Man's Sky solo depende de ti. ¿Serás un luchador que hace presa de los débiles y se lleva sus riquezas o que acaba con los piratas para hacerse con sus botines? Ese poder está en tu mano si mejoras la velocidad y el armamento de tu nave.
 
 ¿Serás un comerciante? Encuentra ricos recursos en mundos olvidados y explótalos al mayor precio. Invierte en más espacio de carga y cosecharás enormes recompensas.
 
 ¿O quizá un explorador? Ve más allá de las fronteras conocidas y descubre lugares y cosas que nadie ha visto antes. Mejora tus motores para llegar cada vez más lejos y refuerza tu traje para sobrevivir en entornos tóxicos capaces de matar a los desprevenidos. Comparte tu viaje La galaxia es un lugar que vive y respira. Los convoyes comerciales viajan entre las estrellas, las facciones luchan por dominar territorios, los piratas dan caza a los desprevenidos y la policía siempre vigila. Todos los demás jugadores viven en la misma galaxia, y si quieres podrás compartir con ellos tus descubrimientos en un mapa que abarca todo el espacio conocido. Quizá veas los resultados de sus acciones, además de los de las tuyas...

Inspiré par l'aventure et l'imagination qui nous fascinent dans les films de science-fiction classique, No Man's Sky vous présente une galaxie à explorer, remplie de planètes et de formes de vie uniques, dans un environnement bourré de danger et d'action.
 
 Dans No Man's Sky, chaque étoile est la lumière d'un soleil lointain, en orbite duquel se trouvent des planètes pleines de vie. Et vous pouvez aller où vous voulez. Volez sans interruption de l'espace à la surface des planètes, sans écran de chargement ni limite. Dans cet univers infini généré de manière dynamique, vous découvrirez des lieux et des créatures qu'aucun autre joueur n'a jamais vus... et qui n'existeront peut-être jamais ailleurs. Embarquez pour un voyage épique Au centre de la galaxie se trouve une impulsion irrésistible, qui vous attire au cours d'une quête pour comprendre la véritable nature du cosmos. Mais face à des créatures hostiles et de féroces pirates, vous apprendrez que la mort a un prix, et que la survie dépendra des choix que vous ferez quant à l'amélioration de votre vaisseau, de votre arme et de votre tenue. Trouvez votre propre destin Vous seul déciderez de votre voyage dans No Man's Sky. Serez-vous un guerrier, prêt à s'attaquer aux faibles pour leur voler leur trésor, ou éliminerez-vous les pirates pour toucher les primes ? Si vous améliorez les réacteurs et les armes de votre vaisseau, vous deviendrez puissant.
 
 Ou bien un marchand ? Trouvez des ressources précieuses sur des mondes oubliés et exploitez-les pour devenir riche. Investissez dans une soute plus grande pour faire fortune.
 
 Ou encore explorateur ? Dépassez la frontière connue et découvrez des lieux et des choses que personne n'a jamais vus. Améliorez vos moteurs pour sauter encore plus loin, renforcez votre combinaison pour survivre aux environnements toxiques qui tueraient les imprudents. Partagez votre voyage La galaxie est un lieu vivant, autonome. Les convois marchands circulent entre les étoiles, les factions se disputent leurs territoires, les pirates traquent les imprudents, et la police veille. Tous les autres joueurs vivent dans la même galaxie, et vous pouvez choisir de partager vos découvertes avec eux sur une carte qui couvre l'espace connu. Vous verrez peut-être le résultat de leurs actions, en plus des vôtres…

No Man's Sky wurde vom Sinn für Abenteuer und Fantasie der klassischen Science-Fiction inspiriert und lässt dich eine Galaxie erforschen, die voller einzigartiger Planeten und Lebensformen ist – und in der dich ständige Gefahren und jede Menge Action erwarten.
 
 Bei No Man's Sky ist jeder Stern das Licht einer entfernten Sonne, die von Planeten voller Leben umkreist wird – und du kannst zu jedem davon reisen! Fliege direkt aus dem Weltall auf Planetenoberflächen, ohne Ladebildschirm und ohne Einschränkungen. In diesem grenzenlosen, in Echtzeit generierten Universum entdeckst du Orte und Kreaturen, die noch kein anderer Spieler zuvor gesehen hat – und vielleicht auch nie wieder sehen wird. Begib dich auf eine epische Reise Im Zentrum der Galaxie schlägt ein unwiderstehlicher Puls, der dich zu sich zieht, um das wahre Wesen des Kosmos zu erfahren. Feindselige Kreaturen und wilde Piraten sorgen jedoch dafür, dass der Tod stets auf der Lauer liegt, und dein Überleben wird davon abhängen, wie du dein Schiff, deine Waffe und deinen Anzug verbesserst. Finde dein eigenes Schicksal Deine Entdeckungsreise bei No Man's Sky liegt ganz in deinen Händen. Wirst du ein Kämpfer, der sich an den Schwachen bereichert, oder machst du Jagd auf Piraten und deren Schätze? Deine Macht steigt, wenn du dein Schiff aufrüstest und es schneller und kampfkräftiger machst.
 
 Oder wirst du ein Händler? Spüre wertvolle Rohstoffe auf vergessenen Planeten auf und verkaufe sie zum Höchstpreis. Investiere in mehr Lagerraum und vergrößere deine Gewinnspanne.
 
 Oder wirst du vielleicht ein Entdecker? Überschreite die bekannten Grenzen und entdecke Orte und Dinge, die noch nie jemand zu Gesicht bekommen hat. Verbessere deinen Antrieb, um noch weiter reisen zu können, und verstärke deinen Anzug, um in lebensfeindlichen Umgebungen zu überleben. Teile deine Reise Die Galaxie ist ein lebendiger, pulsierender Ort. Handelskonvois zwischen Sternen, Fraktionen im Kampf um Gebiete, Piraten auf der Jagd nach Opfern und die stets wachsame Polizei. Alle anderen Spieler leben in derselben Galaxie wie du und du kannst deine Entdeckungen auf einer Karte, die den bekannten Weltraum umfasst, mit ihnen teilen. Vielleicht siehst du die Ergebnisse ihres Tuns ebenso wie die deiner eigenen Handlungen ...

Inspirado nas aventuras e na imaginação que adoramos da ficção científica clássica, No Man's Sky apresenta-te uma galáxia para explorares, cheia de planetas e seres sem igual, bem como de perigo e ação constantes.
 
 Em No Man's Sky, cada estrela é a luz de um sol distante, em cuja órbita encontrarás planetas cheios de vida, e podes visitar qualquer um à tua escolha. Voa do espaço profundo para as superfície planetárias, sem ecrãs de carregamento e sem limites. Neste universo infinito de geração por procedimentos vais descobrir locais e criaturas que nenhum outro jogador viu - e talvez nunca mais as voltes a ver. Parte numa viagem épica No centro da galáxia está um impulso irresistível que te leva numa viagem na sua direção, para descobrires a verdadeira natureza do cosmos. Mas enfrentando criaturas hostis e piratas temíveis descobrirás que a morte tem um preço, e que o segredo da sobrevivência está nas escolhas que fazes quando melhoras a tua nave, a tua arma e o teu fato. Descobre o teu destino A tua viagem pelo No Man’s Sky está nas tuas mãos. Serás um guerreiro, atacando os fracos e levando as suas riquezas, ou caçarás piratas para receberes recompensas? A escolha de melhorares a tua nave para velocidade ou armamento é tua.
 
 Ou um comerciante? Encontra recursos em mundos esquecidos e explora-os para obteres os melhores preços. Investe em mais espaço para carga e ganharás recompensas gigantescas.
 
 Ou talvez sejas um explorador? Atravessa a fronteira do espaço conhecido e descobre lugares e coisas nunca vistas. Melhora os teus motores para saltares ainda mais longe e reforça o teu fato para sobreviveres em ambientes tóxicos que matariam os mais incautos. Partilha a tua viagem A galáxia é um lugar cheio de vida. Comboios comerciais viajam entre estrelas, fações lutam por territórios, piratas caçam os incautos e a polícia tudo observa. Todos os outros jogadores vivem na mesma galáxia e podes escolher partilhar as tuas descobertas com eles num mapa do espaço conhecido. Talvez vejas os resultados das suas ações, bem como das tuas...

古典的なSFの冒険と想像力から着想を得た『No Man's Sky』で、プレイヤーはユニークな惑星と生命体、そして危険とアクションに満ちた銀河を探索します。
 
 『No Man's Sky』には遥か彼方にある数々の恒星が登場し、それぞれが生命を持つ複数の惑星を持っています。プレイヤーは好きな惑星を選んで探索します。深宇宙から惑星の表面までスムーズに飛びましょう。そこにはローディング画面も制限もありません。この無限に自動生成される宇宙において、プレイヤーはまだ誰も見たことがない様々な場所と生き物を発見することになります。もしかすると、その先それらを誰も発見することはないかもしれません。 壮大な宇宙旅行に出発 銀河の中心には好奇心を掻き立てる、魅力的な鼓動が刻まれています。そこに向かって旅立ち、宇宙の真の姿を知りましょう。しかし、攻撃的な生き物や狂暴な宇宙海賊など、宇宙は危険に溢れた場所でもあります。生存するためには適切な選択、そして宇宙船、武器、スーツのアップグレードが必要となります。 自分で運命を決定 『No Man's Sky』は自由度が高く、行動はプレイヤー次第です。戦士となって敵を倒して略奪し、海賊を撃破して財宝を手に入れますか？宇宙船をアップグレードすることで速度と武器が強化され、さらなる力が得られます。
 
 交易商人となるのもいいでしょう。忘れ去られた世界で豊かな資源を獲得し、高い価格で販売しましょう。貨物スペースに投資して、さらなる利益を獲得できます。
 
 それとも探検者となりますか？既知の宇宙を飛び出して、まだ誰も見たことがない場所や物を発見しましょう。エンジンをアップグレードしてさらに遠くまでジャンプし、スーツを強化して死をもたらすような有害な環境でも活動できるようにすることが可能です。 壮大な旅を共有 銀河は生命の息づく場所です。交易戦団が恒星と恒星の間を飛び、様々な勢力が領地を広げ、海賊が略奪を行い、警察は監視を行っています。他の全てのプレイヤーも同じ銀河に住んでおり、既知の外に広がる宇宙のマップで発見物を共有できます。他のプレイヤーの行動が自分に影響を与えることもあるかもしれません…

Inspired by the adventure and imagination that we love from classic science-fiction, No Man's Sky presents you with a galaxy to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action. 
  
  In No Man's Sky, every star is the light of a distant sun, each orbited by planets filled with life, and you can go to any of them you choose. Fly smoothly from deep space to planetary surfaces, with no loading screens, and no limits. In this infinite procedurally generated universe, you'll discover places and creatures that no other players have seen before - and perhaps never will again. 
  Now including...  Play with all major updates since launch: Foundation, Pathfinder, Atlas Rises, NEXT, The Abyss, Visions, the 2.0 BEYOND update, Synthesis, Living Ship, Exo Mech, Desolation and the 3.0 update, ORIGINS, Next Generation, Companions, Expeditions, Prisms, Frontiers, Sentinel, Outlaws, Endurance, Waypoint (4.0),  Fractal, Interceptor, Echoes, Omega, Orbital and Worlds Part I (5.0).
  And now with added  Cross-Save ! No Man’s Sky now supports  Cross-Play  and  Cross-Save  between a huge number of platforms including PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 5 Pro, Xbox One and Series X/S, Game Pass, GOG, Nintendo Switch, Steam Deck, PlayStation VR 1 & 2 and PCVR.
  
  Available for PC and Mac (see recommended and minimum specs for details). 
  
  An epic voyage to the centre of a shared universe awaits, allowing you to explore, trade, fight and survive alone or with friends. 
  Embark on an epic voyage  At the centre of the galaxy lies a irresistible pulse which draws you on a journey towards it to learn the true nature of the cosmos. But, facing hostile creatures and fierce pirates, you'll know that death comes at a cost, and survival will be down to the choices you make over how you upgrade your ship, your weapon and suit. 
  Find your own destiny  Your voyage through No Man's Sky is up to you. Will you be a fighter, preying on the weak and taking their riches, or taking out pirates for their bounties? Power is yours if you upgrade your ship for speed and weaponry. 
  
  Or a trader? Find rich resources on forgotten worlds and exploit them for the highest prices. Invest in more cargo space and you'll reap huge rewards. 
  Or perhaps an explorer? Go beyond the known frontier and discover places and things that no one has ever seen before. Upgrade your engines to jump ever farther, and strengthen your suit for survival in toxic environments that would kill the unwary. 
  Share your journey  The galaxy is a living, breathing place. Trade convoys travel between stars, factions vie for territory, pirates hunt the unwary, and the police are ever watching. Every other player lives in the same galaxy, and you can choose to share your discoveries with them on a map that spans known space. Perhaps you will see the results of their actions as well as your own...

  Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition  Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition is the quintessential Borderlands 3 experience, featuring the base game plus all 6 content add-ons and the full collection of bonus cosmetic packs!
    
 
  Borderlands 3 Super Deluxe Edition  Continue your Borderlands 3 adventure with the Season Pass!
 
 This content is included with purchase of the Borderlands 3 Super Deluxe Edition, Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition, and Borderlands 3 Collector's Edition.
 
     The Season Pass includes:   Moxxi’s Heist of the Handsome Jackpot campaign add-on.
   Guns, Love, and Tentacles campaign add-on.
   Bounty of Blood campaign add-on.
   Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck campaign add-on.

  About the Game    
 The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and an all-new mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of four brand new Vault Hunters – the ultimate treasure-seeking badasses of the Borderlands, each with deep skill trees, abilities, and customization. Play solo or join with friends to take on insane enemies, score loads of loot and save your home from the most ruthless cult leaders in the galaxy. A MAYHEM-FUELED THRILL RIDE  Stop the fanatical Calypso Twins from uniting the bandit clans and claiming the galaxy’s ultimate power. Only you, a thrill-seeking Vault Hunter, have the arsenal and allies to take them down.       YOUR VAULT HUNTER, YOUR PLAYSTYLE  Become one of four extraordinary Vault Hunters, each with unique abilities, playstyles, deep skill trees, and tons of personalization options. All Vault Hunters are capable of awesome mayhem alone, but together they are unstoppable. LOCK, LOAD, AND LOOT With bazillions of guns and gadgets, every fight is an opportunity to score new gear. Firearms with self-propelling bullet shields? Check. Rifles that spawn fire-spewing volcanoes? Obviously. Guns that grow legs and chase down enemies while hurling verbal insults? Yeah, got that too.       NEW BORDERLANDS  Discover new worlds beyond Pandora, each featuring unique environments to explore and enemies to destroy. Tear through hostile deserts, battle your way across war-torn cityscapes, navigate deadly bayous, and more!       QUICK & SEAMLESS CO-OP ACTION Play with anyone at any time with online co-op, regardless of your level or mission progress.

title: Eternal Card Game
description:
Six-guns and sorcery collide in Eternal, the strategy card game of unlimited choices and unbelievable fun! Eternal offers the best of both worlds:

• Rich, deep strategic gameplay and counterplay with fast-spells and tactical combat!
• Next-gen mobile-friendly digital design with quick, smooth and intuitive gameplay!   
• …all wrapped up with exciting digital mechanics and the most generous game economy out there! 
     
Play What You Want  

Eternal is the most truly, generously free-to-play digital card game you can find. We’re committed to giving players the cards they need and the creative freedom to build any deck you can imagine.

Every card and every game mode in Eternal can be played for free, without ever paying a dime.
   	
The only limits are your imagination –  Eternal  has no restrictions on which cards can be played together in your deck!      

Play How You Want 

Eternal has a variety of game modes to suit any player:
   	 
• Tournaments  – Test your mettle in competitive play with cash prizes!
• Events  – Frequent events introduce fun new twists and temporary rules!
• Constructed  – Battle for the top spot in multiple constructed formats with month-long Leaderboards!
• Practice Mode  – Pull off wacky combos in fun pick up games. Jank welcome!
• Draft  – Build a deck on the fly from 48 cards passed by other players, and keep what you Draft!
• Sealed League  – Crack 14 packs and build your way to victory in a month-long Sealed League!
• Promo Quests  – Each month introduces a new card that can be earned for free during special Promo Quests!
• Campaign  – Join the battle for the Eternal Throne in story-driven PVE campaigns that introduce new cards to the game!
• Forge  – Level up your game against the AI in Forge! Pick cards for your deck from sets of three, and see how far you can go!
• Gauntlet  – Learn new tricks in the Gauntlet! Test your constructed deck against AI opponents and wild Boss Powers designed by the best professional TCG players in the world!  

Play When You Want  

Eternal’s cross-platform play brings your decks and your collection anywhere you want to be. Your account goes with you to just about anywhere, so there’s always time for a lightning-fast game!
 
Eternal is available on:
 
• PC on Steam
• Xbox One & Microsoft Store
• Nintendo Switch
• Android Phones and Tablets
• iOS Phones and Tablets

¡Iza la bandera! 
Héroes de distintas facciones luchan por el Trono Eternal con la ayuda de hechizos y espadas, revólveres y subterfugio. ¿De qué lado estarás? Entra en combate con Eternal, el nuevo juego de cartas y estrategia en el que te esperan opciones ilimitadas y toneladas de diversión.

Los mejor de dos mundos 
Eternal combina el ritmo y los gráficos de un juego AAA con las infinitas posibilidades de un elaborado juego de cartas y estrategia. Crear cualquier mazo que puedas imaginar mezclando de forma libre cartas de una colección en constante crecimiento y libra frenéticos combates. ¡Tu creatividad es el único límite!
 
Un juego que crece con sus jugadores 
En Eternal siempre hay algo nuevo. Gracias a la frecuente introducción de nuevas cartas entre las distintas actualizaciones el juego nunca queda obsoleto, y la incorporación continua de nuevo contenido hace que hasta los jugadores más experimentados deban estar siempre alerta. ¿Qué mazo vas a crear?

Pon a prueba tu ingenio sin tocar tu cartera 
¿Estás buscando un juego gratuito sin sorpresas desagradables? Lo acabas de encontrar. En Eternal puedes desbloquear todos los modos de juego y conseguir todas las cartas sin tener que pagar ni un céntimo. No hay trucos: es completamente gratis.
 
Enemigos en cada esquina 
La IA táctica de Eternal ha sido desarrollada manualmente por algunos de los mejores jugadores profesionales de juegos de cartas coleccionables del mundo. Gracias a sus docenas de mazos enemigos, sus originales mecánicas de juego y sus alucinantes entornos de «jefe final», Eternal es capaz de ofrecer un desafío a sus jugadores a cualquier hora del día o de la noche.
 
La elección es tuya 
Combina cientos de cartas como tú quieras. ¡Puedes construir cualquier tipo de mazo, no hay límites!
Los hechizos rápidos y las tácticas de combate te mantendrán en estado de alerta constante  

Siempre hay tiempo para una partida 
Disfruta en tu tableta de innovadoras mecánicas digitales, partidas rápidas de cinco minutos y combates fluidos e intuitivos
Gracias a sus premios continuos y nuevos retos nunca te aburrirás  
  
No «pagues para ganar», «juega para ganar»  
En otros juegos tienes que pagar para coleccionar cartas, pero los jugadores de Eternal pueden conseguir todas las cartas gratis

Hissez la bannière! 
Avec des sorts et des épées, des six-coups et des subterfuges, les héros s'affrontent dans la lutte pour le trône d'Eternal. Quel sera votre camp ? Rejoignez le combat dans Eternal, le nouveau jeu de cartes de stratégie aux choix illimités et au plaisir inégalé.

Le meilleur des deux mondes 
Eternal apporte un rythme et une finition AAA aux possibilités infinies d'un jeu de cartes de stratégie approfondi. Composez tous les decks que vous pouvez imaginer en mélangeant librement les cartes d'une collection toujours grandissante, et plongez au cœur de batailles ultrarapides. Vous ne serez limité que par votre propre créativité.
 
Un jeu qui évolue avec ses joueurs 
Dans Eternal, il y a toujours quelque chose de nouveau. De nouvelles cartes sont fréquemment ajoutées entre les grosses mises à jour afin de garantir que la méta ne perde pas de son intérêt. Un ajout régulier de nouveau contenu tient même les joueurs les plus expérimentés en haleine. Qu'allez-vous créer ?

Mettez votre esprit à l'épreuve, pas votre portefeuille 
Vous cherchez un chapeau blanc à votre taille ? Le voilà. Tout le gameplay, chaque carte et chaque mode de jeu d'Eternal peuvent être gagnés ou débloqués sans jamais devoir débourser un sou. Le jeu est un véritable Free to Play.
 
Des ennemis à chaque coin de rue 
L'IA tactique d'Eternal a été conçue par certains des meilleurs joueurs professionnels de JCC du monde. Avec des dizaines de decks ennemis, des environnements de « boss de niveau » et des mécaniques de jeu exclusives, Eternal est capable de mettre les joueurs au défi à toute heure du jour ou de la nuit.
 
Le choix vous appartient 
Des centaines de cartes se combinent comme vous le souhaitez, il n'y a aucune limite à ce que vous pouvez construire
Les sorts rapides et les tactiques de combat signifient que vous n'êtes jamais tout à fait en sécurité  
  
On trouve toujours le temps de faire une partie 
Mécaniques numériques innovantes, parties rapides terminées en cinq minutes, interface pour tablette fluide et intuitive
Les récompenses régulières et les nouveaux défis maintiennent les joueurs impliqués 
 
« Jouer pour gagner » et ne pas « payer pour gagner »  
Tandis que d'autres jeux vous poussent à payer pour obtenir des cartes, Eternal permet aux joueurs de gagner chaque carte gratuitement

Hiss Das Banner! Mit Zaubern, Schwertern, Revolvern und List treffen Helden im Kampf um den Ewigen Thron aufeinander. Auf welcher Seite stehst du? Schließe dich dem Kampf in Eternal an, dem neuen strategischen Kartenspiel, das ultimative Entscheidungen und großen Spaß bietet.
 
Das Beste Beider Welten 
Eternal verbindet das Tempo und den Feinschliff eines AAA-Spiels mit den unendlichen Möglichkeiten eines tiefgründigen strategischen Kartenspiels. Stell ein beliebiges Deck aus einer sich ständig erweiternden Sammlung von Karten zusammen und tauche in blitzschnelle Kämpfe ein. Die einzige Grenze ist deine eigene Kreativität.

Ein Spiel, das mit seinen Spielern wächst
In Eternal gibt es stets etwas Neues zu entdecken. Regelmäßige Veröffentlichungen neuer Karten zwischen den Sets garantieren, dass das Meta-Game nie langweilig wird. Ein ständiger Zufluss zu entdeckender Inhalte halten auch die erfahrensten Spieler ganz schön auf Trab. Was wirst du erschaffen?

Stell dein Können auf die Probe, und nicht deine Brieftasche
Du suchst nach einem durch uns durch positiven Erlebnis? Dann bist du hier richtig. Wirklich alles – jede Karte und jeder Spiel-Modus – in Eternal kann entweder verdient oder freigeschaltet werden, ohne auch nur einen Cent dafür ausgeben zu müssen. Es ist wirklich kostenlos spielbar.

Gegner hinter jeder Ecke
Die taktische KI von Eternal wurde von einigen der besten professionellen TCG-Spieler der Welt handgefertigt. Mit Dutzenden von gegnerischen Decks, wilden „Boss-Leveln“ und einzigartigen Kartenmechaniken, fordert Eternal Spieler zu jeder Zeit bei Tag oder bei Nacht heraus.

Du hast die Wahl
Hunderte von Karten können so kombiniert werden, wie es dir gefällt – es gibt keine Grenzen
Schnellzauber und Kampftaktiken bedeuten, dass du nie total sicher bist

Zeit für ein Spiel gibt es immer
Innovative digitale Mechaniken, schnelle fünfminütige Partien, einfaches und intuitives Spielen auf dem Tablet
 Ständige Belohnungen und neue Herausforderungen halten die Spieler bei Laune
 
„Spielen, um zu gewinnen“ nicht „Bezahlen, um zu gewinnen“ 
Andere Spiele verlangen, dass du für die Karten bezahlst – in Eternal kann man alle Karten kostenlos verdienen

Hasteie o estandarte! 
Os heróis brigam pelo Trono de Eternal com feitiços e espadas, revólveres e subterfúgios. De que lado você ficará? Junte-se à batalha de Eternal, o novo jogo de cartas estratégico com infinitas possibilidades e diversão infinita.

O melhor dos dois mundos 
Eternal vem com possibilidades infinitas dentro de um incrível jogo de cartas estratégico. Uma coleção crescente de cartas que você poderá combinar livremente e usar para montar o baralho que quiser para disputar batalhas superdinâmicas. O único limite é a sua criatividade.
 
Um jogo que cresce com os jogadores. 
Há sempre algo novo no Eternal. Há sempre um lançamento de conjuntos e cartas novas para garantir que o jogo seja sempre dinâmico. O fluxo constante de conteúdo inexplorado mantém alerta até os jogadores mais experientes. Do que você é capaz?

Um desafio para sua sagacidade e não para sua carteira. 
Procurando um Procurando um jogo realmente gratuito? Aqui está. Você pode obter e desbloquear toda jogabilidade do Eternal — todas as cartas de qualquer modo de jogo — sem gastar nenhum centavo. É um jogo realmente gratuito.
 
Inimigos a cada turno 
A IA tática do Eternal foi feita meticulosamente pelos melhores jogadores profissionais de TCG do mundo. Com dezenas de baralhos inimigos, ambientes de “final de fase” desafiadores e mecânica de cartas exclusiva, o Eternal está pronto para desafiar os jogadores a qualquer hora do dia ou da noite.

A escolha é sua 
Combine centenas de cartas como quiser — não há limites para o que você quiser compor.
Feitiços rápidos e táticas de combate não garantem a sua segurança.  
  
Há sempre tempo para uma partida. 
Jogos intuitivos e fluidos em dispositivos móveis com uma mecânica digital inovadora de jogos rápidos de cinco minutos.
Os desafios e as recompensas constantes mantêm os jogadores envolvidos.  

“Jogar para ganhar” e não “pagar para ganhar”.  
Nos outros jogos, é preciso pagar para obter as cartas; no Eternal, os jogadores ganham todas as cartas de graça.

In alto il vessillo! 
Con incantesimi e spade, revolver e sotterfugi, gli eroi si scontrano sfidandosi per il Trono Eternal. Da che parte starai? Unisciti alla battaglia in Eternal, il nuovo gioco di carte con infinite possibilità e divertimento illimitato.

Il meglio di due mondi differenti 
Eternal porta il ritmo e la perfezione di un gioco AAA nelle infinite possibilità di un gioco di carte strategico. Crea qualsiasi mazzo tu riesca a immaginare usando liberamente le carte di una collezione in continua crescita e lanciati in battaglie fulminee. L'unico limite è la tua creatività.
 
Un gioco che cresce con i suoi giocatori 
In Eternal, c'è sempre qualcosa di nuovo. Frequenti pubblicazioni di nuove carte fra i lanci dei set per garantire che il meta-game non sia mai immobile. Un continuo afflusso di nuovi contenuti farà sì che anche i giocatori più esperti debbano tenersi sempre pronti. Cosa vuoi creare?
 
Metti alla prova la tua mente, non il portafoglio. 
Cerchi un gioco onesto che faccia al caso tuo? L’hai appena trovato. In Eternal, tutte le carte e le modalità di gioco possono essere guadagnate o sbloccate senza pagare un centesimo. È un autentico Free-to-play.
 
Nemici dietro ogni angolo 
L’intelligenza artificiale di Eternal è stata creata da alcuni dei migliori giocatori di giochi di carte al mondo. Grazie a decine di mazzi nemici, selvaggi ambienti da “livello boss" e meccaniche uniche, Eternal è pronto a sfidare i giocatori a ogni ora del giorno e della notte.
 
La scelta è tua 
Centinaia di carte da combinare insieme come preferisci: non ci sono limiti a quello che puoi creare
Rapidi incantesimi e tattiche di combattimento implicano che non sei mai totalmente al sicuro  
 
C'è sempre tempo per una partita 
Innovative meccaniche digitali, partite rapide da cinque minuti, giocabilità intuitiva e fluida da tablet
Premi costanti e nuove sfide per non annoiare nessun giocatore  

"Gioca per vincere", non "Paga per vincere"  
Altri giochi ti fanno pagare per collezionare le carte. Invece, i giocatori di Eternal possono ottenere gratuitamente tutte le carte

brief:
Six-guns and sorcery collide in Eternal, the strategy card game of unlimited choices and unbelievable fun! Eternal offers the best of both worlds:

• Rich, deep strategic gameplay and counterplay with fast-spells and tactical combat!
• Next-gen mobile-friendly digital design with quick, smooth and intuitive gameplay!   
• …all wrapped up with exciting digital mechanics and the most generous game economy out there! 
     
Play What You Want  

Eternal is the most truly, generously free-to-play digital card game you can find. We’re committed to giving players the cards they need and the creative freedom to build any deck you can imagine.

Every card and every game mode in Eternal can be played for free, without ever paying a dime.
   	
The only limits are your imagination –  Eternal  has no restrictions on which cards can be played together in your deck!      

Play How You Want 

Eternal has a variety of game modes to suit any player:
   	 
• Tournaments  – Test your mettle in competitive play with cash prizes!
• Events  – Frequent events introduce fun new twists and temporary rules!
• Constructed  – Battle for the top spot in multiple constructed formats with month-long Leaderboards!
• Practice Mode  – Pull off wacky combos in fun pick up games. Jank welcome!
• Draft  – Build a deck on the fly from 48 cards passed by other players, and keep what you Draft!
• Sealed League  – Crack 14 packs and build your way to victory in a month-long Sealed League!
• Promo Quests  – Each month introduces a new card that can be earned for free during special Promo Quests!
• Campaign  – Join the battle for the Eternal Throne in story-driven PVE campaigns that introduce new cards to the game!
• Forge  – Level up your game against the AI in Forge! Pick cards for your deck from sets of three, and see how far you can go!
• Gauntlet  – Learn new tricks in the Gauntlet! Test your constructed deck against AI opponents and wild Boss Powers designed by the best professional TCG players in the world!  

Play When You Want  

Eternal’s cross-platform play brings your decks and your collection anywhere you want to be. Your account goes with you to just about anywhere, so there’s always time for a lightning-fast game!
 
Eternal is available on:
 
• PC on Steam
• Xbox One & Microsoft Store
• Nintendo Switch
• Android Phones and Tablets
• iOS Phones and Tablets

title: Gunfire Reborn
description:
Gunfire Reborn is a level-based adventure game featuring FPS, roguelite and RPG. Players can control heroes with various abilities to experience diverse Build gameplay, use various weapons to explore procedurally-generated levels. You can play the game alone, or join 4-player coop.

Every level is random; each new restart is a brand-new experience. You will meet different heroes and experience new weapons, items, checkpoints, and unique combat rhythms throughout the game.

title: The Operative: No One Lives Forever
description:
No One Lives Forever is to be a fast-paced, story-driven first-person shooter that delivers over-the-top action, outrageous villains, and wry humor in the tradition of the great 1960's Bond films. You play Cate Archer an undercover operative for MI-Zero. Your mission is to arrange for the defection of a prominent East German biophysicist that goes by the name of Otto Dentz. However things go wrong when a terrorist group known as the HARM abducts Dentz during a flight to England.

Assume the role of Cate Archer, an operative working for UNITY, a secret organization fighting to free the world from the clutches of H.A.R.M.. From tense subterfuge to in-your-face combat, No One Lives Forever ups the ante with 1960's-influenced spy action, vivid international locates, and deadly arch villains.

title: Phoenix Point
description:
Phoenix Point is the acclaimed strategy game from the creator of X-COM, now with Steam Workshop support!
 
 The Earth has been overrun. A mutating, alien menace threatens the last remnants of mankind. Only the Phoenix Project, a secret organization of the best minds and bravest soldiers left on earth, can repel the invasion and reverse the inevitable. The Phoenix Project looks to you for leadership. Research and develop new technologies, explore a ravaged globe, build your bases, manage resources, and dominate the battlefield. 
 
 Just remember: you're not alone out there. Factions, including the corporatist New Jericho, the indecisive Synedrion, and the fanatical Disciples of Anu, as well as a variety of offshoot subfactions, have their own values, goals, and view of the Pandorans. Work with these factions via Phoenix Point's diplomacy system, use subterfuge to steal what you need from them, or simply crush all around you with military might. No matter what you choose, victory won't be easy.
 
       
 
   Phoenix Point Features:  
     Tons of Content:  Over two years of updates, upgrades, fixes, and new content suggested by our community, including Steam Workshop support for subscribing and enabling mods, tweaking existing mods, and setting up your game the way you want to play. Try our example 'Custom Campaign' mod to set up new unique campaigns.
 
     Mutating Alien Menace:  Face down an ever-changing alien threat that adapts to your tactics and offers no respite even as your team becomes more powerful and technologically advanced.
 
       
 
     Uncover the Secrets of the Pandoravirus:  Engage with a complex narrative, complete with multiple endings that the player can only uncover via several playthroughs. Explore, research, and discover a secret history, as you learn about the origins of the mutants, the Pandoravirus, and Phoenix Point itself.
 
     Manage Diplomatic Relations:  The Phoenix Project is not the only organization trying to reclaim the Earth. The militaristic New Jericho, the mystical Disciples of Anu, and the technophiles of Synedrion all offer unique rewards for co-operation and threats for opposition. It is up to you to decide how, or even if, to deal with them.
 
       
 
     Take Aim on the Battlefield:  In addition to equipping and commanding units, Phoenix Point lets you take direct control of your soldier's shots in combat, with a unique free-aiming system. Target enemy weakspots, weapons, or valuables, or just go for center mass. 
 
     Next-Gen Tech with Classic Pedigree:  Phoenix Point was designed by Julian Gollop, the creator of the X-COM series in the 1990s. Integrating the core ethos of X-COM while updating the visuals, technology, and systems to modern standards has made Phoenix Point best-in-class.

La edición completa de Phoenix Point, el alabado juego de estrategia desarrollado por los creadores de X-COM, ya tiene su edición definitiva con todos los contenidos descargables, actualizaciones de contenido y mejoras del producto creados durante cuatro años de desarrollo. ¡Ahora hasta incluye el soporte de mods!
 
 La Tierra ha sido invadida por una raza alienígena mutante que amenaza a los últimos resquicios de humanidad. Solo el Proyecto Fénix, una organización secreta formada por las mentes más brillantes y los soldados más valientes de la Tierra, puede repeler a los alienígenas y evitar lo inevitable. Tu tarea será liderar al Proyecto Fénix, para lo cual tendrás que investigar y desarrollar tecnología y técnicas nuevas, explorar un planeta devastado, gestionar recursos y librar duras batallas.
  
 Recuerda que tienes aliados ahí fuera. Las facciones, incluyendo a los corporativistas de Nueva Jericó, los indecisos de Synedrion, los fanáticos de los Discípulos de Anu y diversas subfacciones, tienen sus propios valores, objetivos y visión de los pandorianos. Colabora con las distintas facciones a través del sistema de diplomacia de Phoenix Point. Usa el subterfugio para robar lo que necesites de ellos, o acaba con todo lo que te rodea gracias a tu poderío militar. Da igual la opción que tomes, la victoria no será fácil. Disfruta de la mejor versión de Phoenix Point y sus desafiantes mecánicas con la edición completa de Phoenix Point. La edición completa contiene: 
    Montones de contenido. La edición completa de Phoenix Point incluye todo el contenido lanzado anteriormente: 6 paquetes de contenido descargable (Sangre y titanio, El legado de los antiguos, Cielos en descomposición, Horizontes corruptos, Motores Kaos y Armas vivientes) y muchas actualizaciones, mejoras, soluciones de errores y nuevo contenido sugerido por la comunidad.
  
   La amenaza de alienígenas mutantes: Enfréntate a una amenaza alienígena que no deja de mutar para adaptarse a tus tácticas, sin darte ni un respiro, mientras tu equipo se vuelve cada vez más poderoso y avanzado a nivel tecnológico.
  
   Descubre los secretos del Pandoravirus: Disfruta de una narrativa compleja con diversos finales que solo se pueden descubrir terminando el juego varias veces. Explora, investiga y disfruta de una historia secreta mientras descubres los orígenes de los mutantes, del Pandoravirus y del propio Punto Fénix.
  
   Gestiona relaciones diplomáticas: El Proyecto Fénix no es la única organización que pretende recuperar la Tierra. El grupo militar de Nueva Jericó, los misteriosos Discípulos de Anu y los tecnófilos de Synedrion ofrecen recompensas únicas por cooperar y acabar con los enemigos. Tú eliges cómo lidiar con ellos, o bien si quieres hacerlo.
  
   Apunta en el campo de batalla: Además de equipar y dirigir unidades, Phoenix Point te permite tomar el control de tus soldados en combate con un sistema de apuntado libre y único. Apunta a los puntos débiles de los enemigos, a sus armas, a sus objetos valiosos, o a su centro de masas.
 
       
 
    Tecnología de nueva generación con un sabor clásico: Phoenix Point ha sido diseñado por Julian Gollop, el creador de la franquicia X-COM en la década de 1990. Conserva las características más importantes de la franquicia X-COM con unos elementos visuales, una tecnología y unos sistemas adaptados a la actualidad, algo que convierte a Phoenix Point en uno de los mejores juegos en su género.

Phoenix Point: Complete Edition, le jeu de stratégie acclamé du créateur de la franchise X-COM est désormais regroupé en une collection de rêve qui inclut tous les contenus téléchargeables, toutes les mises à jour et les améliorations sur quatre ans de développement. Cette version inclut également la compatibilité avec les mods !
 
 La Terre a été envahie. Un ennemi extraterrestre mutant menace les derniers survivants humains. Seul le Projet Phoenix, une organisation secrète comptant les plus grands cerveaux et les soldats les plus courageux qu'il reste sur la planète, peut encore repousser l'invasion et inverser la destruction qui semble inévitable. Le Projet Phoenix compte sur vous pour prendre les rênes. Recherchez et développez de nouvelles technologies, explorez la planète ravagée, construisez des bases, gérez les ressources et dominez le champ de bataille.
  
 Mais n'oubliez pas : vous n'êtes pas la seule organisation. Les factions, qui comprennent la Nouvelle-Jéricho corporatiste, le Synédrion indécis et les Disciples d'Anu fanatiques ainsi qu'une sélection de sous-factions ramifiées, ont leurs propres valeurs, objectifs et opinions sur les Pandoriens. Collaborez avec ces factions via le système diplomatique de Phoenix Point, utilisez des subterfuges pour leur voler ce dont vous avez besoin ou écrasez simplement tout ce qui vous entoure à coup d'attaques militaires. Quel que soit votre choix, la victoire ne sera pas facile. Découvrez la meilleure version de ce jeu complexe avec Phoenix Point: Complete Edition.
  
   La version Complete Edition comprend:  
  
 
   Caractéristiques de la « Year One Edition »  
 
    Des tonnes de contenu ! La version Complete Edition de Phoenix Point inclut tout le contenu sorti jusqu'ici : 6 packs de contenu téléchargeable (Sang et titane, Héritage des anciens, Ciels de poison, Horizons corrompus, Engins du Kaos et Armes vivantes), ainsi qu'un tas de mises à jour, d'améliorations, de corrections et du nouveau contenu suggéré par notre communauté.
 
   La compatibilité avec Steam Workshop pour vous abonner et activer des mods qui ajustent et personnalisent votre jeu et créés par la communauté des mods, ainsi que notre mod officiel permettant de configurer de nouvelles campagnes uniques.
 
   Menace extraterrestre mutante : affrontez une menace extraterrestre en constante évolution qui s'adapte à vos tactiques sans vous laisser de répit à mesure que votre équipe gagne en puissance et fait des avancées technologiques.
 
    Gestion des relations diplomatiques: Le Projet Phoenix n'est pas la seule organisation qui tente de reconquérir la Terre. Les militaristes de la Nouvelle-Jéricho, les Disciples d'Anu mystiques et les technophiles du Synédrion proposent des récompenses uniques pour votre coopération et des menaces sérieuses en cas d'opposition. C'est à vous de décider de la nature de vos relations avec ces factions.
 
   Découvrez les secrets du Pandoravirus : immergez-vous dans une intrigue complexe proposant de multiples fins que vous pourrez découvrir en rejouant plusieurs fois au jeu. Explorez, recherchez et révélez une histoire secrète tout en découvrant les origines de ces mutants, du Pandoravirus et de Phoenix Point même.
  
   Gérez les relations diplomatiques : le Projet Phoenix n'est pas la seule organisation qui tente de reprendre possession de la Terre. La Nouvelle-Jéricho militariste, les Disciples d'Anu mystiques et les technophiles du Synédrion offrent tous des récompenses uniques si vous coopérez et des menaces en cas d'opposition. C'est à vous de choisir comment gérer ces relations, si en effet vous choisissez d'entretenir des relations avec ces factions.
  
   Visez sur le champ de bataille : en plus d'équiper et de commander vos unités, Phoenix Point vous permet de diriger directement les tirs de vos soldats en combat. Grâce à un système de visée libre unique, ciblez les points faibles de vos ennemis, leurs armes, leurs objets de valeur ou simplement la masse centrale.
 
       
 
    Une technologie de pointe de lignée classique : Phoenix Point a été conçu par Julian Gollop, le créateur de la franchise X-COM des années 90. Intégrant l'éthique des jeux X-COM tout en améliorant les graphismes, la technologie et les systèmes pour répondre aux standards modernes, Phoenix Point est désormais au top de sa catégorie.

Phoenix Point: Complete Edition, das gefeierte Strategiespiel vom Schöpfer von X-COM, ist jetzt in der ultimativen Sammlung zusammengestellt, einschließlich aller DLCs, Inhaltsaktualisierungen und Produktverbesserungen aus vier Jahren Entwicklung. Jetzt inklusive Mod-Unterstützung!
 
 Die Erde wurde überrannt. Eine mutierende außerirdische Plage bedroht den letzten Rest der Menschheit. Nur das Phönix-Projekt, eine geheime Organisation der klügsten Köpfe und mutigsten Soldaten der Welt, kann die Invasion aufhalten und das Unvermeidliche rückgängig machen. Das Phoenix-Projekt erwartet Führung von dir. Erforsche und entwickle neue Technologien, erkunde einen verwüsteten Planeten, baue deine Basis, verwalte Ressourcen und dominiere das Schlachtfeld.
  
 Denke daran: Du bist da draußen nicht allein. Fraktionen, wie das korporatistische Neu-Jericho, das unentschlossene Synedrion und die fanatischen Jünger von Anu, sowie eine Vielzahl von Unterfraktionen, haben ihre eigenen Werte, Ziele und Ansichten über die Pandoraner. Arbeite mit diesen Fraktionen über das Diplomatiesystem von Phoenix Point zusammen, verwende Ausflüchte, um ihnen das zu stehlen, was du brauchst, oder vernichte einfach alles um dich herum mit militärischer Macht. Ganz gleich, wofür du dich entscheidest, der Sieg wird nicht einfach sein. Erlebe die beste Version des herausfordernden Gameplays von Phoenix Point in Phoenix Point: Complete Edition.
 
   Funktionen der Complete Edition:  
 
   Jede Menge Inhalte: Die Complete Edition von Phoenix Point enthält alle zuvor veröffentlichten Inhalte: 6 DLC-Pakete (Blut & Titan DLC, Vermächtnis der Alten DLC, Faulender Himmel DLC, Verdorbene Horizonte DLC, Kaos-Maschinen DLC und das Lebende Waffen-Paket) und eine Menge Updates, Upgrades, Fixes und neue Inhalte, die von unserer Community vorgeschlagen wurden.
 
   Steam Workshop-Unterstützung für das Abonnieren und Aktivieren von Mods zum Optimieren und Anpassen deines Spiels aus der Modding-Community, neben unserem offiziellen Mod zum Einrichten neuer einzigartiger Kampagnen.
 
   Mutierende Alien-Bedrohung: Stelle dich einer sich ständig ändernden außerirdischen Bedrohung, die sich an deine Taktik anpasst und keine Ruhepause bietet, selbst wenn dein Team mächtiger wird und technologisch fortschreitet.
 
   Enthülle die Geheimnisse des Pandoravirus: Tauche ein in eine komplexe Erzählung mit mehreren Enden, die der Spieler nur durch mehrere Durchgänge aufdecken kann. Erkunde, erforsche und entdecke eine geheime Geschichte, während du mehr über die Ursprünge der Mutanten, des Pandoravirus und Phoenix Point selbst erfährst.
 
    Verwalte diplomatische Beziehungen: Das Phoenix-Projekt ist nicht die einzige Organisation, die versucht, die Erde zurückzuerobern. Das militaristische Neu Jericho, die mystischen Jünger von Anu und die Technikbegeisterten von Synedrion bieten alle einzigartige Belohnungen für die Zusammenarbeit und die Androhung von Opposition. Es liegt an dir, zu entscheiden, wie du mit ihnen umgehst.
 
    Ziele auf dem Schlachtfeld: Zusätzlich zum Ausrüsten und Kommandieren von Einheiten kannst du mit Phoenix Point mit einem einzigartigen System zum freien Zielen die Schüsse deines Soldaten im Kampf direkt kontrollieren. Nimm feindliche Schwachstellen, Waffen oder Wertgegenstände ins Visier oder ziele einfach in die mittlere Masse.
 
       
 
    Technologie der nächsten Generation mit klassischem Stammbaum: Phoenix Point wurde von Julian Gollop, dem Schöpfer der X-COM-Serie in den 1990er Jahren entworfen. Die Integration des Kernethos von X-COM bei gleichzeitiger Aktualisierung der Grafik, Technologie und Systeme auf moderne Standards hat Phoenix Point zum Klassenbesten gemacht.

 The Earth has been overrun. A mutating, alien menace threatens the last remnants of mankind. Only the Phoenix Project, a secret organization of the best minds and bravest soldiers left on earth, can repel the invasion and reverse the inevitable. The Phoenix Project looks to you for leadership. Research and develop new technologies, explore a ravaged globe, build your bases, manage resources, and dominate the battlefield. 
 
 Just remember: you're not alone out there. Factions, including the corporatist New Jericho, the indecisive Synedrion, and the fanatical Disciples of Anu, as well as a variety of offshoot subfactions, have their own values, goals, and view of the Pandorans. Work with these factions via Phoenix Point's diplomacy system, use subterfuge to steal what you need from them, or simply crush all around you with military might. No matter what you choose, victory won't be easy.
 
       
 
   Phoenix Point Features:  
     Tons of Content:  Over two years of updates, upgrades, fixes, and new content suggested by our community, including Steam Workshop support for subscribing and enabling mods, tweaking existing mods, and setting up your game the way you want to play. Try our example 'Custom Campaign' mod to set up new unique campaigns.
 
     Mutating Alien Menace:  Face down an ever-changing alien threat that adapts to your tactics and offers no respite even as your team becomes more powerful and technologically advanced.
 
       
 
     Uncover the Secrets of the Pandoravirus:  Engage with a complex narrative, complete with multiple endings that the player can only uncover via several playthroughs. Explore, research, and discover a secret history, as you learn about the origins of the mutants, the Pandoravirus, and Phoenix Point itself.
 
     Manage Diplomatic Relations:  The Phoenix Project is not the only organization trying to reclaim the Earth. The militaristic New Jericho, the mystical Disciples of Anu, and the technophiles of Synedrion all offer unique rewards for co-operation and threats for opposition. It is up to you to decide how, or even if, to deal with them.
 
       
 
     Take Aim on the Battlefield:  In addition to equipping and commanding units, Phoenix Point lets you take direct control of your soldier's shots in combat, with a unique free-aiming system. Target enemy weakspots, weapons, or valuables, or just go for center mass. 
 
     Next-Gen Tech with Classic Pedigree:  Phoenix Point was designed by Julian Gollop, the creator of the X-COM series in the 1990s. Integrating the core ethos of X-COM while updating the visuals, technology, and systems to modern standards has made Phoenix Point best-in-class.

L'acclamato gioco strategico dei creatori di X-COM, Phoenix Point: Complete Edition, viene ora assemblato in una collezione definitiva che include tutti i DLC, gli aggiornamenti dei contenuti e i miglioramenti pubblicati in più di quattro anni di sviluppo. È ora disponibile anche il supporto per le mod!
 
 La Terra è stata invasa. Una razza aliena mutante minaccia ciò che resta del genere umano. Solo il Progetto Phoenix, un'organizzazione segreta composta dalle menti più brillanti e dai soldati più coraggiosi rimasti sulla Terra, è in grado di respingere gli alieni e impedire la catastrofe ormai inevitabile. È compito tuo guidare il Progetto Phoenix: esegui ricerche e sviluppa nuove tecnologie, esplora un pianeta alla deriva, gestisci le risorse e domina il campo di battaglia.
  
 Ma ricordati: non combatti solo tu. Le fazioni, tra cui la corporativista Nuova Gerico, la dubbiosa Synedrion, i fanatici Discepoli di Anu e diverse fazioni minori, hanno ciascuna i propri valori, i propri obiettivi e le proprie convinzioni sui Pandora. Puoi scegliere di collaborare con le fazioni tramite il sistema di diplomazia di Phoenix Point, ricorrere a sotterfugi per rubare da loro ciò di cui hai bisogno oppure distruggere tutto quello che trovi grazie alla tua potenza militare. Qualsiasi cosa sceglierai, non sarà una vittoria facile. Vivi la migliore versione del complesso gameplay di Phoenix Point grazie alla Complete Edition.
 
   Caratteristiche della Complete Edition:  
 
    La Complete Edition di Phoenix Point include tutti i contenuti già pubblicati: 6 pacchetti DLC (Sangue e titanio, Eredità degli antichi, Cieli infetti, Orizzonti corrotti, Kaos Engines e il Living Weapons Pack) e tantissimi aggiornamenti, potenziamenti e nuovi contenuti suggeriti dalla nostra community.
 
   Supporto per Steam Workshop, al fine di sottoscrivere e attivare mod per modificar e personalizzare la tua partita grazie alla comunità di modder, oltre che grazie al nostro mod ufficiale per avviare nuove campagne uniche.
 
    Minaccia aliena mutante: affronta una minaccia aliena in continua evoluzione che si adatta alle tue tattiche e che non offre tregua, nemmeno quando la tua squadra diventa più potente e tecnologicamente avanzata.
 
    Scopri i segreti del Pandoravirus: immergiti in una narrazione complessa, con molteplici finali che il giocatore può scoprire solo attraverso diverse esperienze di gioco. Esplora, esegui ricerche e svela una storia segreta mentre scopri le origini dei mutanti, del Pandoravirus e dello stesso Phoenix Point.
 
    Gestisci le relazioni diplomatiche: il Progetto Phoenix non è l'unica organizzazione che tenta di rivendicare la Terra. La militaristica Nuova Gerico, i mistici Discepoli di Anu e i tecnofili di Synedrion offrono ricompense uniche per chi decide di collaborare, e minacce per chi si oppone. Sta a te decidere come, o se, avere a che fare con loro.
 
    Prendi la mira sul campo di battaglia: oltre a equipaggiare e comandare le unità, Phoenix Point ti permette di controllare direttamente i colpi del tuo soldato in combattimento, con un esclusivo sistema di mira libera. Mira ai punti deboli, alle armi o agli oggetti di valore del nemico, oppure punta al baricentro.
 
       
 
    Tecnologia di nuova generazione di origine classica: Phoenix Point è stato progettato da Julian Gollop, il creatore della serie X-COM degli anni '90. Integrare l'etica di base di X-COM aggiornando gli elementi visivi, la tecnologia e i sistemi agli standard moderni ha reso Phoenix Point il migliore della categoria.

title: No One Lives Forever 2: A Spy in H.A.R.M.'s Way
description: No One Lives Forever 2: A Spy in H.A.R.M.'s Way is a first-person shooter video game developed by Monolith Productions, and published by Sierra Entertainment. It was released on September 30, 2002. It is the second game in the No One Lives Forever series, the sequel to the 2000 game The Operative: No One Lives Forever. The story follows super-spy Cate Archer as she once again takes up arms against the international criminal organization H.A.R.M.

title: LISA: The Painful
description:
LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition is the miserable, hilarious RPG of your wildest nightmares. Undertake a relentless journey through the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Olathe. Beneath its charming exterior is a world full of disgust and moral desolation, where you will learn what kind of person you are by being FORCED to make choices that permanently affect the gameplay. Make sacrifices to keep your party members alive, whether it's taking a beating for them, losing limbs, or some other inhuman torture. In this world, you will learn that being selfish and heartless is the only way to survive...
 
 The Definitive Edition brings new content and nightmares to the game with HD graphics, 120 FPS mode, new party member campfire conversations, updated battle systems, new border art overlays, new music, music player (including music from LISA: The First), Painless (Story) mode, and new secrets to explore. 
 
 
     
  
 - 100+ unique character battles.
    
 - Visible character sacrifices that affect your stats and attacks (removing arms, eyes, scratches).
    
 - Recruit up to 30 party members in towns and camps.
    
 - Make ruthless choices that permanently affect towns, characters, and lives.
    
 - Participate in white-knuckle shopping cart races, extreme weight lifting, and other minigames.
    
 - Bet your party members on Russian Roulette for huge profit, but permanently lose them if they die.
    
 - Listen to your favorite tracks in the music player, which also includes music from LISA: The First.
    
 - Discover countless secrets hidden throughout Olathe.
    
 - Play Painful mode for an extra challenge and unique enemies, or Painless mode for a story-focused experience.
    
 - A life-ruining gaming experience.

LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition es el RPG más miserable e hilarante de tus peores pesadillas. Emprende un viaje implacable por el páramo postapocalíptico de Olathe. Debajo de su encantador exterior hay un mundo lleno de repugnancia y desolación moral, donde descubrirás qué tipo de persona eres al verte obligado a tomar decisiones que afectarán permanentemente al juego. Haz sacrificios para mantener con vida a los miembros de tu grupo: llévate los golpes, pierde extremidades o sométete a alguna que otra tortura inhumana. En este mundo, aprenderás que ser egoísta y desalmado es la única forma de sobrevivir...
 
 La Definitive Edition incluye nuevo contenido y pesadillas con gráficos en alta definición, modo 120 FPS, nuevas conversaciones de hoguera entre los miembros del grupo, sistemas de batalla actualizados, nuevos bordes para la interfaz, nueva música, reproductor de música (con música de LISA: The First), modo sin dolor (historia) y nuevos secretos que explorar. 
 
 
     
  
 - Más de 100 batallas con personajes únicos.
    
 - Sacrificios notorios de los personajes que afectan a tus atributos y ataques, como la mutilación de brazos, pérdidas de ojos o rasguños.
    
 - Recluta hasta 30 miembros para tu grupo en ciudades y campamentos.
    
 - Toma decisiones despiadadas que afectarán permanentemente a las ciudades, los personajes y los seres vivos en general...
    
 - Participa en emocionantes carreras de carritos de la compra, competiciones extremas de levantamiento de pesas y otros minijuegos.
    
 - Juégate a los miembros de tu grupo en la ruleta rusa para obtener grandes beneficios, pero despídete de ellos para siempre si pierden.
    
 - Escucha tus canciones favoritas en el reproductor de música, con música de LISA: The First.
    
 - Descubre un sinfín de secretos ocultos en Olathe.
    
 - Juega en modo doloroso y afronta un desafío adicional con enemigos únicos o en modo sin dolor para disfrutar de una experiencia más centrada en la historia.
    
 - Una experiencia de juego que te destrozará la vida.

LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition est le RPG misérable et hilarant de vos pires cauchemars. Entreprenez un voyage impitoyable à travers les terres désolées postapocalyptiques d’Olathe. Au-delà de son apparence charmante se cache un monde rempli de dégout et de désolation morale, qui vous forcera à faire des choix qui affecteront le gameplay de manière permanente et qui révèleront qui vous êtes vraiment. Faites des sacrifices pour maintenir en vie les membres de votre groupe, que ce soit en prenant des coups pour eux, en perdant un bras, une jambe, ou en subissant d’autres tortures inhumaines. Dans ce monde, vous apprendrez que pour survivre, il faut être égoïste et sans cœur...
 
 La Definitive Edition apporte en jeu des nouveaux contenus et cauchemars, avec des graphismes HD, un mode 120 FPS, de nouvelles conversations autour du feu de camp avec les membres de l’équipe, des systèmes de combat mis à jour, de nouvelles superpositions d’art de bordure, de nouvelles musiques, un lecteur de musique (incluant la musique de LISA: The First), le mode Sans douleur (histoire) et de nouveaux secrets à découvrir. 
 
 
     
  
 - Plus de 100 combats contre des personnages uniques.
    
 - Des sacrifices qui affecteront les statistiques et les attaques de vos personnages et dont les effets sont bien visibles (perte de bras, d’yeux, griffures).
    
 - Recrutez jusqu’à 30 membres dans les villes et les camps.
    
 - Faites des choix impitoyables qui affectent les villes, les personnages et les vies de manière permanente.
    
 - Participez à des courses de chariots à couper le souffle, à des séances d’haltérophilie extrême et à d’autres minijeux...
    
 - Pariez sur les membres de votre groupe à la roulette russe pour un énorme profit, mais si l’un d’eux meurt, vous le perdrez définitivement.
    
 - Écoutez vos morceaux préférés dans le lecteur de musique, dont la musique de LISA: The First.
    
 - Découvrez d’innombrables secrets dissimulés à travers Olathe.
    
 - Jouez en mode Douloureux pour un challenge supplémentaire et des ennemis uniques, ou en mode Sans douleur pour une expérience axée sur l’histoire.
    
 - Une expérience de jeu qui vous pourrira la vie.

LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition ist das elendige, urkomische RPG deiner wildesten Albträume. Mach eine gnadenlose Reise durch das postapokalyptische Ödland von Olathe. Unter der charmanten Oberfläche verbirgt sich eine Welt voller Abscheu und moralischer Verwahrlosung, in der du dein wahres Wesen herausfinden wirst, indem du GEZWUNGEN wirst, Entscheidungen zu treffen, die das Gameplay dauerhaft beeinflussen. Opfere dich, um deine Gruppenmitglieder am Leben zu halten - sei es, indem du für sie einsteckst, Gliedmaßen verlierst oder dich anderweitig unmenschlichen Qualen aussetzt. In dieser Welt lernst du, dass Selbstsucht und Herzlosigkeit der einzige Weg sind, um zu überleben...
 
 Die Definitive Edition bringt neue Inhalte und Alpträume ins Spiel mit HD-Grafik, 120 FPS-Modus, neuen Gesprächen am Lagerfeuer, aktualisierten Kampfsystemen, neuen Grenzkunst-Overlays, neuer Musik, Musikspieler (inklusive Musik von LISA: The First), Painless (Story)-Modus und neuen Geheimnissen zum Erkunden. 
 
 
     
  
 - Über 100 einzigartige Charakterkämpfe.
    
 - Sichtbare Opfer von Charakteren, die sich auf deine Werte und Angriffe auswirken können (Verlust von Armen, Augen, Kratzer).
    
 - Rekrutiere bis zu 30 Gruppenmitglieder in Städten und Lagern.
    
 - Triff gnadenlose Entscheidungen, die Städte, Charaktere und Menschenleben dauerhaft beeinflussen.
    
 - Mach mit bei nervenaufreibenden Einkaufswagenrennen, intensivem Gewichtheben und anderen Minispielen.
    
 - Verwette deine Gruppenmitglieder beim russischen Roulette für riesige Gewinne, aber verliere sie dauerhaft, wenn sie sterben.
    
 - Hör deine Lieblingstitel im Musik-Player an, der auch Musik von LISA: The First enthält.
    
 - Entdecke unzählige Geheimnisse, die in Olathe verborgen sind.
    
 - Spiele den Painful-Modus für eine extra Herausforderung und einzigartige Feinde oder den Painless-Modus für eine Story-fokussierte Erfahrung.
    
 - Eine lebens-ruinierende Spielerfahrung.

LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition é o RPG miserável e hilário dos seus pesadelos mais selvagens. Embarque em uma jornada implacável pelo deserto pós-apocalíptico de Olathe. Por baixo de sua aparência encantadora, há um mundo cheio de repugnância e desolação moral, onde você descobrirá que tipo de pessoa você é ao ser FORÇADA a tomar decisões que afetam permanentemente o jogo. Faça sacrifícios para salvar os membros de seu grupo, seja aguentando os golpes no lugar deles, perdendo partes do corpo ou sofrendo outras formas de tortura desumana. Nesse mundo, você aprenderá que ser egoísta e cruel é a única forma de sobreviver... 
   
  A Definitive Edition adiciona ao jogo novos conteúdos e pesadelos com gráficos em alta definição, modo de 120 FPS, novas conversas de acampamento com membros do grupo, sistema de batalha atualizado, novas sobreposições de arte de borda, novas músicas, tocador de música (incluindo a trilha de LISA: The First), modo Indolor (história) e novos segredos para explorar.  
   
      
   
  - Mais de 100 batalhas únicas de personagens. 
  - Sacrifícios que ficam visíveis no personagem, afetando seus atributos e ataques (como remover braços, olhos e sofrer arranhões). 
     - Recrute até 30 membros para o grupo em cidades e acampamentos. 
     - Faça escolhas impiedosas que afetam cidades, personagens e vidas permanentemente. 
     - Participe de corridas emocionantes de carrinho de compras, levantamento de peso extremo e outros minijogos. 
     - Aposte os membros do seu grupo na roleta-russa para obter lucros enormes, mas os perca permanentemente se eles morrerem. 
     - Ouça suas faixas favoritas no tocador de música, que também inclui a trilha de LISA: The First. 
  - Descubra inúmeros segredos escondidos por Olathe. 
     - Jogue no Modo Dor para encarar desafios extras e inimigos únicos, ou no Modo Indolor para uma experiência mais voltada à história. 
     - Uma experiência de jogo de arruinar a vida.

LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition is the miserable, hilarious RPG of your wildest nightmares. Undertake a relentless journey through the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Olathe. Beneath its charming exterior is a world full of disgust and moral desolation, where you will learn what kind of person you are by being FORCED to make choices that permanently affect the gameplay. Make sacrifices to keep your party members alive, whether it's taking a beating for them, losing limbs, or some other inhuman torture. In this world, you will learn that being selfish and heartless is the only way to survive...
 
 The Definitive Edition brings new content and nightmares to the game with HD graphics, 120 FPS mode, new party member campfire conversations, updated battle systems, new border art overlays, new music, music player (including music from LISA: The First), Painless (Story) mode, and new secrets to explore. 
 
 
     
  
 - 100+ unique character battles.
    
 - Visible character sacrifices that affect your stats and attacks (removing arms, eyes, scratches).
    
 - Recruit up to 30 party members in towns and camps.
    
 - Make ruthless choices that permanently affect towns, characters, and lives.
    
 - Participate in white-knuckle shopping cart races, extreme weight lifting, and other minigames.
    
 - Bet your party members on Russian Roulette for huge profit, but permanently lose them if they die.
    
 - Listen to your favorite tracks in the music player, which also includes music from LISA: The First.
    
 - Discover countless secrets hidden throughout Olathe.
    
 - Play Painful mode for an extra challenge and unique enemies, or Painless mode for a story-focused experience.
    
 - A life-ruining gaming experience.

title: Divinity: Original Sin II
description:
Divinity: Original Sin II is a single- and multiplayer top-down, party-based role-playing game with pen & paper RPG-like levels of freedom. It features turn-based combat, a strong focus on systematic gameplay and a well-grounded narrative.

The Divine is dead. The Void approaches. And the powers lying dormant within you are soon to awaken. The battle for Divinity has begun. Choose wisely and trust sparingly; darkness lurks within every heart.

title: Vampyr
description:
London, 1918. You are newly-turned Vampyr Dr. Jonathan Reid. As a doctor, you must find a cure to save the city’s flu-ravaged citizens. As a Vampyr, you are cursed to feed on those you vowed to heal.

Will you embrace the monster within? Survive and fight against Vampyr hunters, undead skals, and other supernatural creatures. Use your unholy powers to manipulate and delve into the lives of those around you, to decide who will be your next victim. Struggle to live with your decisions… your actions will save or doom London.

Vampyr is set in early 20th century Britain as the country is gripped by the lethal Spanish flu and the streets of London are crippled by disease, violence and fear. In a disorganized and ghostly city, those foolish, desperate, or unlucky enough to walk the streets lay prey to Britain’s most elusive predators: the vampires. Emerging from the chaos, a tormented figure awakens. You are Jonathan E. Reid, a high-ranking military surgeon transformed into a vampire upon his return home from the frontline.

Explore the darkly atmospheric streets of early 20th century London, and interact with a multitude of characters with their own identities and importance. Accept and fulfill the missions they give you, but don’t forget: sooner or later, you will have to feed, and make a difficult choice... who will be your prey? Absolutely all characters in the game are potential victims of your vampiric lust. Carefully study the habits of your next victim, his or her relationships with other characters, and set up your strategy to feed, unnoticed: seduce them, change their daily habits, or make sure they end up alone in a dark street...

Be careful who you choose to hunt, as they will be gone forever, and their death will impact in a meaningful way the world that surrounds you. Feeding on human blood will not just keep you "alive"; it will also unlock new vampiric powers to use.

There will be times when exploration and seduction will only get you so far, and you'll need to resort to engaging in Vampyr's dynamic real-time combat. It blends hard-hitting melee combat with ranged shooting mechanics and the supernatural vampire powers. You'll face many types of enemies: different species of vampires and creatures, as well as vampire hunters who want to hunt you down with their weapons, tools and traps. In Vampyr, your health and the "energy" that drives your supernatural powers are one and same! Using powers will drain your own blood, giving you an edge in battle but also leaving you weaker. You will have to find a way to feed during combat to replenish your strength.

Vampyr also offers a deep crafting system. Find and loot materials and components from the fresh corpses of your victims or during exploration, in order to craft and improve tools, melee and ranged weapons, as well as special ammunitions and coating to exploit the weaknesses of your enemies.

As you cling to what remains of your humanity, your decisions will ultimately shape the fate of your hero while searching for answers in the coughing, foggy aftermath of the Spanish Flu.

title: BioShock Infinite
description:
BioShock Infinite is the third game in the BioShock series. It is not a direct sequel/prequel to any of the previous BioShock games but takes place in an entirely different setting, although it shares similar features, gameplay and concepts with the previous games. BioShock Infinite features a range of environments that force the player to adapt, with different weapons and strategies for each situation. Interior spaces feature close combat with enemies, but unlike previous games set in Rapture, the setting of Infinite contains open spaces with emphasis on sniping and ranged combat against as many as fifteen enemies at once.

BioShock Infinite takes place in the airborne city of Columbia in 1912, where the player assumes the role of Booker DeWitt, a disgraced ex-Pinkerton agent. Booker has been given the job of finding a mysterious and powerful woman imprisoned in Columbia since birth named Elizabeth in order to wipe his debts away, and the story follows the unlikely duo as they journey to escape the flying city while discovering its twisted secrets.

Booker has been given the job of finding a mysterious and powerful woman imprisoned in Columbia since birth named Elizabeth in order to wipe his debts away, and the story follows the unlikely duo as they journey to escape the flying city while discovering its twisted secrets.

Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on the line, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and now hired gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean. He must rescue Elizabeth, a mysterious girl imprisoned since childhood and locked up in the flying city of Columbia. Forced to trust one another, Booker and Elizabeth form a powerful bond during their daring escape. Together, they learn to harness an expanding arsenal of weapons and abilities, as they fight on zeppelins in the clouds, along high-speed Sky-Lines, and down in the streets of Columbia, all while surviving the threats of the air-city and uncovering its dark secret. Key Features   	 The City in the Sky  – Leave the depths of Rapture to soar among the clouds of Columbia. A technological marvel, the flying city is a beautiful and vibrant world that holds a very dark secret. 
   	 Unlikely Mission  – Set in 1912, hired gun Booker DeWitt must rescue a mysterious girl from the sky-city of Columbia or never leave it alive. 
   	 Whip, Zip, and Kill  – Turn the city’s Sky-Lines into weaponized roller coasters as you zip through the flying city and dish out fatal hands-on punishment.
   	 Tear Through Time  – Open Tears in time and space to shape the battlefield and turn the tide in combat by pulling weapons, turrets, and other resources out of thin air.
   	 Vigorous Powers  – Throw explosive fireballs, shoot lightning, and release murders of crows as devastatingly powerful Vigors surge through your body to be unleashed against all that oppose you. 
   	 Custom Combat Experience  – With deadly weapons in one hand, powerful Vigors in the other, and the ability to open Tears in time and space, fight your own way through the floating city of Columbia to rescue Elizabeth and reach freedom. 
   	 1999 Mode  – Upon finishing BioShock Infinite, the player can unlock a game mode called “1999 Mode” that gives experienced players a taste of the kind of design and balance that hardcore gamers enjoyed back in the 20th century.

Il doit secourir Elizabeth, une mystérieuse jeune femme emprisonnée depuis sa plus tendre enfance et enfermée dans la ville flottante de Columbia. Forcés de se faire mutuellement confiance, Booker et Elizabeth établiront une puissante relation durant leur audacieuse évasion. Ensemble, ils apprendront à exploiter un arsenal croissant d'armes et de capacités, lors de combats sur des zeppelins dans les nuages, à toute vitesse sur des Sky-Lines (aérofrets) et dans les rues de Columbia, tout en survivant aux menaces de la cité volante et en découvrant son sombre secret. Un labyrinthe technologique, la ville est un monde magnifique et dynamique cachant un très sombre secret.
    Mission improbable  – Se déroulant en 1912, le mercenaire Booker DeWitt doit secourir une mystérieuse jeune femme de la ville flottante ou ne jamais en sortir vivant.

brief:
BioShock Infinite is the third game in the BioShock series. It is not a direct sequel/prequel to any of the previous BioShock games but takes place in an entirely different setting, although it shares similar features, gameplay and concepts with the previous games. BioShock Infinite features a range of environments that force the player to adapt, with different weapons and strategies for each situation. Interior spaces feature close combat with enemies, but unlike previous games set in Rapture, the setting of Infinite contains open spaces with emphasis on sniping and ranged combat against as many as fifteen enemies at once.

BioShock Infinite takes place in the airborne city of Columbia in 1912, where the player assumes the role of Booker DeWitt, a disgraced ex-Pinkerton agent. Booker has been given the job of finding a mysterious and powerful woman imprisoned in Columbia since birth named Elizabeth in order to wipe his debts away, and the story follows the unlikely duo as they journey to escape the flying city while discovering its twisted secrets.

title: Minds Beneath Us
description:
Story Embark on a thrilling sci-fi journey in a futuristic Asian city with MINDS BENEATH US. In a society fully automated by advanced AI, you find yourself trapped in a foreign body, alongside the subconscious of its original owner. 
 
 As society evolves, a new industry emerges that replaces the hardware needed to operate AI-automated systems with human brains. Consequently, the most disadvantaged citizens have had no choice but to sign up one after another. Against the backdrop of this mad society, a conspiracy gradually unfolds.
 
   Features 
   Players can make their own dialogue choices and shape the relationships between characters throughout the journey. The combination of dialogue choices and actions will continually affect the story.  
   Observe environments, pay attention to the dialogue, and then look for hidden clues in every scene. This way, you can even unlock new dialogue choices.  
    With hand-drawn animation and smooth camera movement, a unique cinematic experience is created.  
    The game combines 2D characters and detailed 3D environments to present the streets of a near-future Taipei.

游戏剧情 
 《沉没意志》讲述了主角戴士杰与寄宿在他体内的神秘意识所共同经历的一段冒险。
 
 在人工智能全面普及并取代大量工作的未来社会，一个全新的产业诞生了。通过将大量人脑相连所产生的运算网络，无数传统人工智能需要的昂贵硬件被轻易地取代了。
 也因此，无数因人工智能而失业的弱势群体全都投入了这样的工作。
 以这个病态社会为舞台，一桩阴谋逐渐显现。
 
   主要玩法 
   通过持续进行对话选择，玩家与游戏中形形色色的角色之间的关系将产生变化，并最终对剧情造成影响。
   观察环境、聆听角色所说的话，在场景中找到隐藏线索，解锁对话选项。
   手绘动画和灵活运镜，在横向视角也能打造电影的感受。
   2D混合3D的场景，并且以亚洲城市的当代风貌为基础，设计一个熟悉又陌生的近未来世界。  
 加入玩家QQ群： 679786176

背景設定 沉沒意志講述一段主角戴士傑與那能控制他身體的神祕意識所共同經歷的冒險。
 
 在人工智慧全面普及並取代大量工作的未來社會，一個全新的產業誕生了。透過將大量人腦相連所產生的運算網路，無數傳統人工智慧需要的昂貴硬體被輕易地取代了。
 也因此，無數因人工智慧而失業的弱勢人口全都投入了這樣的工作。
 以這個病態社會為舞台，一樁陰謀逐漸顯現。
 
   主要玩法 
   玩家可以透過持續進行對話選擇，讓你跟角色們的關係產生改變，並最終對劇情造成影響。  
   觀察環境、聆聽角色們說的話，在場景中找到隱藏的線索，解鎖對話的選項。     手繪動畫和靈活運鏡，在橫向視角也能打造電影的感受。      2d混合3d的場景，並且以台灣當代風貌為基礎設計一個近未來世界。

ストーリー 
 『Minds Beneath Us』は主人公「ジェイ」とその体を操っている謎の「マインズ」と共に冒険をする物語である。
 
 人工知能の普及によりほとんどの仕事が奪われた未来、大量な失業者が現れた。その反動で人間の脳を繋げて運用するネットワークが誕生し、高額な設備投資が必要な旧来型の人工知能は淘汰されてしまう。
 
 人工知能に仕事を奪われた失業者の多くがこの「人脳ネットワーク」に加わっていく……
 
 そんな病的な社会で、ある陰謀が浮上する……
 
   特徴 
   会話の選択を通してキャラクター同士の関係性を変え、ストーリーに影響を与えられる。
   環境調査、他のキャラクターとの会話やシーンで手がかりを見つけることで会話の選択肢をアンロック。
   本作品は手描きアニメーションとカメラワークを巧みに運用しており、横スクロールで映画のような体験。
   2D描画と3Dシーンで現代の台湾をテーマにデザインした近未来世界が特徴。

title: Broforce
description: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force.
